citations.narrative:
In the fourth run on the outdoor access side, one panel is loose and moves when dogs touch it by the gate end, but is still
secured to the building wall. A panel that is loose could eventually fall and cause dog injury. Ensure that panels are
secured and safe for the dogs housed in the enclosures/runs.
***Correct by 11/23/2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.6(a)(1) 
   
Primary enclosures. 
In the fourth run on the outdoor access side, one panel is loose and moves when dogs touch it by the gate end, but is still 
secured to the building wall. A panel that is loose could eventually fall and cause dog injury. Ensure that panels are 
secured and safe for the dogs housed in the enclosures/runs.  
***Correct by 11/23/2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
 n
